title.rendered: ADD A LITTLE PUNK ROCK AND MOODY FOREST GREEN TO YOUR FALL FASHION LOOK

content.rendered:
ADD A LITTLE PUNK ROCK AND MOODY FOREST GREEN TO YOUR FALL FASHION LOOK

Why not upgrade your look by adding a little bit of punk rock to your Fall style and throw in some beautiful moody forest green into the mix too. 

I love mixing this understated punk rock style with ethereal dark green moody florals, black leather pants/bags, and some unique combat boots. 

Don’t be shy to layer feminine and punk rock style necklaces together as well as adding bold earrings.

I also had to throw in this cool minimalistic ‘80s vibe forest green marble clock into the mix for home decor.

So excited for Fall and Winter fashion! 

Click on the following product names to shop – Top green bag is Bottega Veneta. Forest green marble clock is AYTM. Green sunglasses are Loewe. Black bottom bag is Jacquemus. Black boots are OFF-WHITE. Both looks and earrings are from FWRD.COM

Also, don’t forget to lash out with D’Medium Flare individual D’Lashes lashes and our popular D’Wispy Lashes as well as booking your lash extensions appointment!

Xo Xo, Dionne
